/**/ /*<![CDATA[*/ document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () { const scheduleSection = document.getElementById('schedule-section'); const nextSchedule = document.querySelector('.content.flex-grow-1');
if (typeof schedule === 'undefined' || !schedule || !scheduleSection || !nextSchedule) { // Jika tidak ada jadwal atau elemen tidak ditemukan, sembunyikan section if (scheduleSection) scheduleSection.classList.add('hidden'); return; }
function countdown() { const now = new Date(); const scheduledDate = new Date(schedule); const difference = scheduledDate - now;
if (difference <= 0) { nextSchedule.innerHTML = `<strong>New Episode</strong> is now available!`; clearInterval(timer); return; }
// Format tanggal: "01 Mar 23:30" const options = { day: '2-digit', month: 'short', hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit', hour12: false }; const formattedDate = scheduledDate.toLocaleString('en-US', options).replace(',', '');
// Hitung waktu mundur const days = Math.floor(difference / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)); const hours = Math.floor((difference % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60)); const minutes = Math.floor((difference % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60)); const seconds = Math.floor((difference % (1000 * 60)) / 1000);
nextSchedule.innerHTML = `<strong>Next Episode</strong> will come at ${formattedDate} (${days} days, ${hours} hours, ${minutes} minutes, ${seconds} seconds)`; }
// Jalankan pertama kali countdown();
// Jalankan ulang setiap detik const timer = setInterval(countdown, 1000); }); /**/
